"A.P.242/2/11 10:00": "Wow, I can't remember the last time everyone showed up like this. We've even got a bunch of guests sitting in."
"Ulc, now's not the time for jokes."
"I know, I know. I was just trying to lighten the mood a little. Now then, let's begin this emergency commander meeting."
"Our topic today is the Goddess of Demise, Shiva. Let's start with what we know."
"In that case, allow me to give a basic outline."
"...I'll be going over everything, Xiao."
"Of course. If we don't make everyone aware, we can't proceed with the discussion."
"The other day, an ARKS ship was assaulted by Shiva. We believe the two people that accompanied her were Photoners."
"Photoners again... But why would they be hostile towards ARKS?"
"She was recorded as having said the following: \"I was once sacrificed for your sake.\""
"According to our data, the [Profound Darkness] that appeared during the Photoner era was sealed away."
"We have verified this fact with Aurora. Although she did not know of Shiva personally, we know this event did occur."
"Someone they forced Photons on, and used as bait to seal [Profound Darkness] away in subspace... A sacrifice. And now they've come back?"
"If we are to believe her words, yes. As for whether that is the truth... Why don't we ask those who crossed blades with her?"
"I felt an unusual power."
"It wasn't just that Shiva girl. The two that were with her stood out too. I agree that they're Photoners."

"However, Shiva was far different still. Our attacks wouldn't connect with her in the
slightest."
"...It was weird. Almost like she was absorbing our blows completely."
"That's right. They were made to be like that."
"Lisa, what do you mean \"like that\"?"

"Lisa means being able to absorb all of a
Photoner's Photons. Can you imagine just how much that would be?"
"Lisa has seen both, and if you ask her, you're quite the strange ones too."
"That's an interesting way of putting it... Lisa, just how much do you know about all of this?"
"I can provide an explanation for that. Lisa, may I take control?"
"Yes yes yes, take over. Wake Lisa up if you need to fight."
"Allow me to introduce myself once more. I am Harriet. I am what you would call a Photoner."
"<%me>. We have met each other once before. Do you recall?"
"In Kuron...?"
"When Matoi disappeared...?"
"Yes. It was quite the surprise back then."
"At that time, I was nothing more than a residual notion."
"I had no awareness of myself as Harriet, and did not possess the same will I do now."
"Speaking to you then was all I could manage... I am glad things turned out for the better."
"...Shiva and I are a pair, of sorts. I am able to speak with you all here precisely because she has appeared."
"So, what, are you saying you're related to her somehow?"
"A soul that was never meant to be, dwelling within a mere vessel. That is I. Harriet, an artificial existence."
"A vessel for Photons... for [Profound Darkness], the final existence that took everything within itself. That is Shiva, Goddess of Demise."
"Our connection is both deep, yet fleeting."
"Civilization was approaching its end in the twilight of the Photoner era."

"Society valued only the manipulation of Photons. Physical bodies, which were easily
replaceable, had lost their value."
"Yet the Photoners could not surmise any existence beyond that of physical bodies. What they desired was the ultimate vessel."
"...There was a certain researcher. He treated the vessel he created not as a vessel, but as another human being."
"He would converse with the silent shell day after day, until it eventually grew a heart, and even awakened to the power of Photons."
"These phenomena were the fruits of his research. A power that stood above all else. An unparalleled power."
"...The researcher was overjoyed. It was not simply a clone, but its own unique existence. A being that could rival the Akashic Record."
"However, the final clone of the Akashic Record... [Profound Darkness] was born around that same time."
"A vessel with the appropriate power was needed in order to seal it and stop its rampage. A vessel that was equal to the Akashic Record. That vessel was myself."
"But a heart was not necessary. My soul... my heart was ripped out, and replaced with Photons."
"Within that shell was born the desire to control all Photons. It became the Goddess of Demise, Shiva."
"How Do We Resist The Demise"
"A Means to Oppose Demise"
